name: Create new rows on Google Sheets for new contacts on Follow Up Boss
description: Every time new contact added to Follow Up Boss, Make will automatically add selected data to a new row in a Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1pUf8mVdfozW-WDRw3tMS8I-IFES32jy01BYVVLrnlbE/edit?usp=sharing)
